metadata.title: CVE-2020-22025 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists in gaussian_blur at libavfilter/vf_edgedetect.c, which might lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
